      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double GeoPoint.azimuthTo(GeoPoint that)
      Calculates the angle (azimuth) in radian that somebody in "this" needs to look to be looking at that.
      double GeoPoint.distanceTo(GeoPoint that)
      Calculates the distance between 2 points on earth.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructor and Description

      Builds a altimetric profile based on the continuous elevation model starting from the origin, , and that follows the great circle in the direction of the of the azimuth.
